item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 27, 2024 at 3:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. I discovered mysterious hidden signals on a public radio channel (2013) [video] (52 points | 11 comments)
2. Understanding Round Robin DNS (238 points | 88 comments)
3. Canvas Fingerprinting (34 points | 16 comments)
4. ZombAIs: From Prompt Injection to C2 with Claude Computer Use (85 points | 24 comments)
5. How JPEG XL compares to other image codecs (47 points | 10 comments)
6. How 'Factorio' seduced Silicon Valley and me (142 points | 171 comments)
7. Fundamentals of Radiance Cascades (75 points | 17 comments)
8. Tell HN: GpuOwl/PRPLL, GPU software used to find the largest prime number (29 points | 12 comments)
9. Using a BCI with LLM for enabling ALS patients to speak again with family (31 points | 3 comments)
10. The weak science behind psychedelics (43 points | 32 comments)
11. Using LLMs to enhance our testing practices (84 points | 30 comments)
12. Deep dive: the instability of op-amps (91 points | 33 comments)
13. Long wave radio fans mourn fading frequencies (2023) (50 points | 20 comments)
14. Order and orient the keys on your keychain (37 points | 48 comments)
15. Goodhart's law isn't as useful as you might think (2023) (49 points | 31 comments)
16. The Mindlessness of Ostensibly Thoughtful Action (1978) [pdf] (33 points | 5 comments)
17. Carma (YC W24) hiring founding SWEs (remote) to build the next Uber for auto repair ( | hide)
18. We Can Terraform the American West (218 points | 278 comments)
19. Olivetti’s Ivrea (24 points | 9 comments)
20. How can this 6 axis robot have a static accuracy of 0.05 mm? (2021) [video] (260 points | 76 comments)
21. Before you buy a domain name, first check to see if it's haunted (849 points | 167 comments)
22. Why ghosts wear clothes or white sheets (72 points | 69 comments)
23. Live imaging of ovulation in action reveals three distinct phases in mice (87 points | 12 comments)
24. Building a more robust Wikipedia interface by spotting the differences (2023) (19 points | 6 comments)
25. ADHD and managing your professional reputation (99 points | 63 comments)
26. We can now fix McDonald's ice cream machines (1057 points | 281 comments)
27. New Windows driver signature bypass allows kernel rootkit installs (266 points | 201 comments)
28. Ion engines could take us to the solar gravitational lens in less than 13 years (69 points | 59 comments)
29. The Japanese word ikigai refers to a passion that gives joy to life (2022) (192 points | 105 comments)
30. Show HN: Mdx – Execute your Markdown code blocks, now in Go (108 points | 47 comments)
